body_html:
This looks good, but it only runs the CPU test in test_cuda (maybe we should be changing the default tensor type or something in test_cuda to avoid this?), and there's a similar problem to the one you found with Mode on GPU.

I'll update this PR soon with a fix for those issues (I'd just do a separate PR but I'm not sure of the right way to merge this and keep TH/THC in sync, so I'll leave it to @soumith).

body:
This looks good, but it only runs the CPU test in test_cuda (maybe we should be changing the default tensor type or something in test_cuda to avoid this?), and there's a similar problem to the one you found with Mode on GPU.

I'll update this PR soon with a fix for those issues (I'd just do a separate PR but I'm not sure of the right way to merge this and keep TH/THC in sync, so I'll leave it to @soumith).
